tuv.seg: 下载歌曲时的命名方式
Select the music naming method for downloading
临时接口（软件的某些功能不可用，建议测试接口不可用再使用本接口）
Temporary API (some features not available; workaround if Test API unavailable)
代理设置（乱设置软件将无法联网）
Proxy (False setting would block Internet connections)
发现新版本并在努力下载中，请稍后...⏳
Update is found and being downloaded...⏳
Right click to remove this entry
启用时将优先播放320K品质的歌曲
The 320k quality is preferred for playing
在任务栏上显示当前歌曲播放进度
Show playing progress on the taskbar
Animation effect of the pop-up layer
所有数据（设置与试听列表）

tu.note: 套路，，套路。看了UI才知道不只是单数

tuv.seg: 是否同时下载歌词文件
Select whether to download the lyrics file
是否将封面嵌入音频文件中
Select whether to embed the cover into the music file
是否显示历史搜索记录
Select whether to show search history
Select whether to show music source
是否显示歌曲源（仅对我的音乐分类有效）
Select whether to show music source (for Your Library only)
Select whether to show popular searches
是否记住播放列表滚动条位置
Select whether to remember the playlist scrollbar position

tu.note: 谁能想到，normal 就算普通 low normal high
区分了一下播放设置和回放设置（歌曲切换方式）逻辑

tuv.seg: 测试接口（几乎软件的所有功能都可用）
Test API (Available for most software features)
添加已选的 {num} 首歌曲到...
离开搜索界面时清空搜索列表
Clear the search list when you are not searching
离开搜索界面时清空搜索框
Clear the search box when you are not searching
缓存大小（清理缓存后图片等资源将需要重新下载，不建议清理，软件会根据磁盘空间动态管理缓存大小）
Cache size (Not recommended since resources such as pictures after the cache is cleaned need re-downloading. The software will dynamically manage the cache size based on disk space)
腾讯、网易音源仅支持下载128k音质
Tencent and NetEase sources only support 128k sound quality
记住列表滚动位置（仅对我的音乐分类有效）
Remember playlist scrolling position (for Your library only)
请选择要优先下载的音质

tu.note: 记着把重心放在前面不容易啊……

tuv.seg: 软件已是最新，尽情地体验吧~🥂
The software is up-to-date, enjoy yourself!🥂
The language displayed in the software
选择声音输出的媒体设备
Select a media device for audio output

tuv.seg: Select the name of music source
都不选时播放完当前歌曲就停止播放
If none selected, it stopped when the music playing is done.
音频加载出错，5 秒后切换下一首
Error loading music. Switch to next song after 5 seconds
